summary:
Windows 7 is an operating system made by Microsoft. It was released in 2009 as an improvement over its previous version, Windows Vista. The new features include an updated taskbar, better window management, and a new file-sharing system. It received positive reviews for its faster performance and easier-to-use interface.

Windows 7 was a big success, selling over 100 million copies in six months. However, it's no longer supported by Microsoft, and many users have switched to newer versions like Windows 10 and Windows 11.
title: Windows 7
